responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?
You can apply for admission through our official college website under the 'Admissions' section.
The admission process requires filling the online form and submitting required documents.
We offer B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, B.Sc, and Diploma courses.
Courses include Engineering, Management, and Science programs.

patterns: How much is the tuition fee?
responses: The fee structure depends on the course. Please check the 'Fee Structure' section on our website.
Engineering fees start from ₹80,000 per year, MBA fees from ₹1,00,000 per year.
Yes, we provide separate hostel facilities for boys and girls.
The hostels are equipped with Wi-Fi, mess, and 24/7 security.
We have a strong placement cell with companies like Infosys, TCS, Wipro, and HCL visiting.
Placement percentage is above 90% for most courses.
Yes, our library has over 50,000 books and digital resources.
We also provide e-library access for all students.
